If you are here, you are probably lost.  Of all the places on the internet you could have gone to, and of all the things you could be doing with your life, you are here.  You must be a rambler.  Maybe not in person, but certainly in mind and in spirit.

::: {.callout-note icon=false}
## Ramble

/răm′bəl/

An intransitive verb.

* To move about aimlessly.  Synonym: wander.

   > - "He roamed and rambled [...] to the sparkling sands of her diamond deserts."
   > - The mind rambled for hours in the labyrinth of roads not taken.
:::

Here, you will find my prosaic musings on some of my rambles.
